author: Paul Kasabian
title: Colorado Avalanche Announce 2nd Player Tested Positive for Coronavirus
description: The  Colorado Avalanche   announced  Saturday that a second member of their team has tested positive for COVID-19.     "The Colorado Avalanche were advised late last night that a second player has tested positive for COVID-19...
content:
Ethan Miller/Getty Images
The Colorado Avalancheannounced Saturday that a second member of their team has tested positive for COVID-19.
"The Colorado Avalanche were advised late last night that a second player has tested positive for COVID-19. The player is… [+1301 chars]
